meanings.definition: To spend or expend money or resources.
meanings.sent1: I dispend my allowance on comic books.
meanings.sent2: She dispend all her savings on a new bicycle.
meanings.sent3: The young boy dispend his birthday money on toys.
meanings.sent4: The company dispend a large sum on advertising.
meanings.sent5: He dispend his energy on helping others.

meanings.sent1: The teacher dispend pencils to the students.
meanings.sent2: The charity dispend food to the homeless.
meanings.sent3: The vending machine dispend snacks with a push of a button.
meanings.sent4: The post office dispend mail to every household.
meanings.sent5: The nurse dispend medication to the patients.

meanings.definition: To do away with or get rid of something.
meanings.sent1: She dispend all the old clothes that no longer fit.
meanings.sent2: The gardener dispend the weeds from the flower bed.
meanings.sent3: The magician dispend the rabbit after the magic show.
meanings.sent4: The chef dispend the burnt toast and made a fresh batch.
meanings.sent5: The janitor dispend the trash from the bins.
